page.title: 14ADULT EMPLOYMENT
page.content: how to get a better crop)He worked for 'Wiltshire Farmers Ltd.'and then 'Nickersons Seed Specialists'.We moved to Urchfont because Mummy liked the view better,here!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! {By Andrew Watts. I used to live in Thetford,Norfolk.My dad works for the R.A.F.He flies a plane. He got a posting to Amesbury in Wiltshire so we moved to Urchfont.I like it here best. My dad is the Navigator of the plane. He drops the bombs,and plans the route that the aircraft will take. He goes to Larkhill Bombing Range (On Salisbury Plain) every Sunday,to have a look where the bombs have dropped. These bombs where dropped during the week, while he has been practicing.At the moment he is on a training course learning how to fight and shoot down enemy aircraft.On this
